import '../App.css'; import logo from "../imgs/logo.svg" import profileIcon from "../imgs//mobile-menu-icon-my-profule.svg" import searchIcon from "../imgs/search-icon.svg" import cartIcon from "../imgs/mobile-menu-icon-cart.svg" import RightMenu from "./RightMenu"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import {useState} from "react"; import {store} from "../store" import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import React, { useCallback } from 'react' import {updateSearch} from "../store/search/actions" const HeaderMenu = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); let [isMenu,setMenu] = useState(false) let [searchValue,setSearch] = useState("") const setSearchValue = useCallback((e) => { setSearch(e.target.value) console.log(searchValue) dispatch(updateSearch(e.target.value)) }, [dispatch]) const search = useCallback((e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log("submited") console.log(searchValue) dispatch(updateSearch(searchValue)) setSearch("") }, [dispatch]) return (
) } export default HeaderMenu
